name: Demeter: The Asklepios Chronicles
storyline: In this revolutionary platformer, you will find yourself for the first time ever solving puzzles, fighting enemies and exploring a brand new world in your own living room. The game uses mixed reality to create levels and challenges in real time that adapt to the environment you are in. Climb, jump, fly and run using your walls - and your furniture! - in a way you have never experienced before.
summary: Help a lost traveler find their ship, explore a hostile world, see combat against various enemies, and uncover secrets of this sci-fi setting in this trailer for Demeter: The Asklepios Chronicles.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Demeter: The Asklepios Chronicles - Official Trailer | Upload VR Showcase Winter 2023
